sentences.english: He always pattens himself after his father.
Right, and now this natural method of pest control is being copied all over the world.
sentences.chinese: 对啊，现在这种自然的防害方法正在全世界被效仿。

sentences.english: Something the Chinese wish the British had done back in the 19th century.
sentences.chinese: 中国人希望效仿19世纪英国人在缅甸的做法。

sentences.english: This mode is followed by many cities inside and outside of the province till now.
sentences.chinese: 至今，该旧城改造模式仍为省内外多个城市效仿。

sentences.english: If the Sitka plan succeeds, other water-rich cities may soon follow.
sentences.chinese: 如果西特卡的计划成功，其他的多水城市会争相效仿。

sentences.english: Working smart means modeling other experienced people and doing your homework.
sentences.chinese: 巧干意味着效仿那些有经验的人来做好自己份内的事。

sentences.english: As with many fashion trends, regular people are following their favorite celebrities.
sentences.chinese: 和许多时尚趋势一样，普通人会效仿他们喜欢的名人。

sentences.english: But that does not mean they are adopting America’s aspirations in Afghanistan.
sentences.chinese: 但是这不意味着他们要在阿富汗效仿美国的雄心壮志。

sentences.english: His ghoulish moves in the video have been imitated by dancers all over the world.
sentences.chinese: 他在录像带中表演的魔鬼舞被全世界的舞者所效仿。

sentences.english: Its complicated mixes like chain-mail and lace are very hard to produce and copy.
sentences.chinese: 它那像锁子甲和蕾丝的混合很难制作和效仿。

sentences.english: New York has followed the example of Paris in establishing a brigade of police-dogs.
sentences.chinese: 纽约已效仿巴黎的做法建立了一支警犬队。

sentences.english: Germany withdrew from the League, soon to be followed by many other aggressive powers.
sentences.chinese: 德国随后退出国联组织，接着许多侵略国也纷纷效仿。

sentences.english: After the mid-Tang, follow the barbarian bun become fashionable.
sentences.chinese: 中唐以后，效仿胡人发髻成为时尚。

sentences.english: I must set an example to this young friend.
sentences.chinese: 雷峰同志为我们树立了可供效仿的榜样。

sentences.english: Even the Chinese are abandoning their methods and trying to be like us.
sentences.chinese: 甚至中国也开始放弃他们的老路子来效仿我们。

sentences.english: But above all, emulate the Chinese in terms of dealing with thieves !
sentences.chinese: 但最重要的是，应效仿中国打击盗窃犯的作法。

definition: to fall over each other in their eagerness to...
one after another/in succession/one by one/continuously/diverse/in profusion/numerous and confused/pell-mell
to take an alternate route (idiom)/to find an alternative/to take a different approach/to blaze a new trail
tempest/wave (of popular sentiment etc)/craze or fad
to do the very opposite/to act in a diametrically opposite way
pinyin: fan3 qi2 dao4 er2 xing2 zhi1

definition: to learn a lesson from the mistakes of one's predecessor (idiom)
there are plenty of such people
to improve one's family's social status by moving up in the world/to switch one's allegiance to a new patron
